Marianne Thamm bụ onye nta akụkọ South Africa, odee na onye na-eme ihe ọchị
Ọ bụ osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Daily Maverick ma dee ọtụtụ akwụkwọ
N'afọ 2016, o wepụtara akwụkwọ ncheta, Hitler, Verwoerd, Mandela na m.
A mụrụ Thamm n'England ebe nna ya bụ onye Germany bụ onye nga agha ma zute nne Thamm, onye ọrụ ụlọ Portuguese
Thamm na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka ọkara Portuguese, ọkara German, na-agbake na Roman Katọlik na-ekweghị na Chineke na ndị inyom kwagara mba ọzọ. Ya na onye otu ya na ụmụ ya nwaanyị abụọ bi na Cape Town.
